predicate.note: Frames file for 'deliberate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

role.descr: thought, thing deliberated on; usually: on/upon/about

example.name: only intransitive
example.text: The Senate will deliberate behind closed doors today and is scheduled to vote on the impeachment tomorrow.

example.name: transitive
example.text: It 's still too early [*PRO*] to confirm , that is we need [*-1] to deliberate between ourselves on whether we see these ideas that [*T*-2] were raised [*-3] here , as a basis for an end game .
example.arg: on whether we see these ideas that [*T*-2] were raised [*-3] here , as a basis for an end game
